attributes.action: Not Build a Prison in Barking & Dagenham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not need a prison in Barking and Dagenham.  We have enough social and economic problems as it is and this will just contribute even more to a deprived area.  We want to try and  sustain our community, not destroy it completely with a proposed 1500 inmate jail. If you feel as strongly as I do, then please sign this petition!
